CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Targeted_School__r.Is_Target_School_for_Program_s__c , "TS Boston"), "TS Boston;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Targeted_School__r.Is_Target_School_for_Program_s__c , "TS Brockton"), "TS Brockton;" , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Targeted_School__r.Is_Target_School_for_Program_s__c , "EOC Boston"), "EOC Boston;" , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Targeted_School__r.Is_Target_School_for_Program_s__c , "EOC Brockton"), "EOC Brockton;" , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Targeted_School__r.Is_Target_School_for_Program_s__c , "UB Brockton"), "UB Brockton", NULL)
